alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 29 at 8:18PM CDT until November 03 at 7:50PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Trinidad. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Minor flooding to woodlands and low land areas will occur on the right bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 33.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 37.1 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall early Wednesday afternoon. It will rise to 37.1 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
